name: Financial Fraud Detection
description: Investigating fraudulent financial transactions and identifying money laundering activities.

cards.title: Counterfeit Currency Detection
cards.description: Techniques for identifying and intercepting counterfeit currency.
bulletpoints: Analyze security features in legal tender
Use UV scanning and microprint detection techniques
Track illegal printing operations and distribution networks
cards.summaryText: Stop counterfeit cash by scrutinizing security features, wielding UV and microprint tools, and mapping illicit printing pipelines before money hits circulation.

cards.title: Forensic Accounting Investigations
cards.description: Tracing illicit financial activities through forensic auditing.
bulletpoints: Identify shell companies and fraudulent bookkeeping
Work with international agencies on cross-border fraud cases
cards.summaryText: Expose hidden fraud by dissecting financial statements, unraveling shell-company ledgers, and partnering with global teams to follow dirty money.
